name: dif_dataflow_pipeline
description: A Dataflow pipeline to ingest CSV data  to BigQuery.

parameters.name: input
parameters.label: Input file path
parameters.helpText: GCS file path for the input CSV file.

parameters.name: output
parameters.label: BigQuery output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table in the format dataset.table.

parameters.name: config
parameters.label: config file path
parameters.helpText: GCS path for the config yaml file like config.yaml
